languages.text: {n}Из-под местами тлеющего алого облачения доносится трель — это бинарная речь, священный язык {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Двоичный гимн перерастает в синтезированный {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-системой{/g} голос, подобный степному грому:{/n} "Ни шагу вперед".

traits.locale_text: {n}Из-под местами тлеющего алого облачения доносится трель — это бинарная речь, священный язык {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Двоичный гимн перерастает в сухой, синтезированный {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-системой{/g} голос:{/n} "Идентифицируйте себя и сообщите о своих мирных намерениях, миряне".

languages.text: {n}A trill comes from the folds of the partially smouldering crimson raiment — it is binharic speech, the sacred language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The binharic hymn transforms into a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesised voice that sounds like thunder rolling over a vast plain:{/n} "Not another step."
languages.original_text: {n}Из-под местами тлеющего алого облачения доносится трель — это бинарная речь, священный язык {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Двоичный гимн перерастает в синтезированный {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-системой{/g} голос, подобный степному грому:{/n} "Ни шагу вперед".

traits.locale_text: {n}A trill comes from the folds of the partially smouldering crimson raiment — it is binharic speech, the sacred language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The binharic hymn transforms into a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesised voice that sounds like thunder rolling over a vast plain:{/n} "Not another step."

{n}A trill comes from the folds of the partially smouldering crimson raiment — it is binary speech, the sacred language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The binary hymn transforms into a dry voice synthesised by the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-system{/g}:{/n} "Identify yourselves and state your intentions, laypeople."

{n}A trill comes from the folds of the partially smouldering crimson raiment — it is binharic speech, the sacred language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The binharic hymn transforms into a dry voice synthesised by the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-system{/g}:{/n} "Identify yourselves and state your intentions, laypersons."

{n}A trill comes from the folds of the partially smouldering crimson raiment — it is binharic speech, the sacred language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The binharic hymn transforms into a dry voice synthesised by the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-system{/g}:{/n} "Identify yourselves and state your intentions, laypersons."

{n}A trill comes from the folds of the partially smouldering crimson raiment — it is binharic speech, the sacred language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The binharic hymn transforms into a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesised voice that sounds like thunder rolling over a vast plain:{/n} "Not another step."

{n}A trill comes from the folds of the partially smouldering crimson raiment — it is binharic speech, the sacred language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The binharic hymn transforms into a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesised voice that sounds like thunder rolling over a vast plain:{/n} "Not another step."

languages.text: {n}一阵颤音从深红色长袍闷燃的褶皱中传了出来。那是二进制的语言，是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的神圣语言。{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统的语音合成器将他的颂唱翻译出来，声音如同雷鸣一般。{/n}“禁止前进。”
languages.original_text: {n}A trill comes from the folds of the partially smouldering crimson raiment — it is binharic speech, the sacred language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The binharic hymn transforms into a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesised voice that sounds like thunder rolling over a vast plain:{/n} "Not another step."

traits.locale_text: {n}一阵颤音从深红色长袍闷燃的褶皱中传了出来。那是二进制的语言，是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的神圣语言。{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵系统{/g}的语音合成器将二进制语言翻译成了干涩的通用语。{/n}“表明你的身份，陈述你的来意。”

languages.text: {n}Un gorjeo surge entre los pliegues de sus vestimentas carmesíes, parcialmente quemadas: es lenguaje binario, el idioma sagrado del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. El himno binario se transforma en una voz sintetizada por un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}que retumba como el trueno en las praderas:{/n} «Ni un paso más».
languages.original_text: {n}A trill comes from the folds of the partially smouldering crimson raiment — it is binharic speech, the sacred language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The binharic hymn transforms into a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesised voice that sounds like thunder rolling over a vast plain:{/n} "Not another step."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un gorjeo surge entre los pliegues de sus vestimentas carmesíes, parcialmente quemadas: es lenguaje binario, el idioma sagrado del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. El himno binario se transforma en una voz seca sintetizada por su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}sistema de voco{/g}:{/n} «Identifíquense y declaren sus intenciones».

languages.text: {n}一部がグズグズと燃える深紅の衣服のしわからトリル音が鳴る。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の神聖な言語である、ビンハリック言語だ。ビンハリック賛歌は、広大な平原を転がる雷鳴のような{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}の合成音声に変わる{/n}「一歩も動くな」
languages.original_text: {n}A trill comes from the folds of the partially smouldering crimson raiment — it is binharic speech, the sacred language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The binharic hymn transforms into a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesised voice that sounds like thunder rolling over a vast plain:{/n} "Not another step."

traits.locale_text: {n}一部がグズグズと燃えている深紅の衣服のしわからトリル音が鳴る…{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の神聖な言語である、ビンハリック言語だ。ビンハリック賛歌は、広大な平原を転がる雷鳴のような{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}合成{/g}音声に変わる{/n}「一歩も動くな」

languages.text: {n}Un trille émerge des plis de sa tenue écarlate en partie consumée ; vous reconnaissez du binhaire, l'idiome sacré de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. L'hymne se transforme en une voix synthétisée par un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} semblable au roulement du tonnerre sur une vaste plaine :{/n} « Halte-là. »
languages.original_text: {n}A trill comes from the folds of the partially smouldering crimson raiment — it is binharic speech, the sacred language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The binharic hymn transforms into a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesised voice that sounds like thunder rolling over a vast plain:{/n} "Not another step."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un trille émerge des plis de sa tenue écarlate en partie consumée ; vous reconnaissez du binhaire, l'idiome sacré de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. L'hymne se transforme en une voix sèche, synthétisée par un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}système-vox{/g} :{/n} « Déclinez votre identité et vos intentions. »

languages.text: {n}Aus den Falten des teilweise noch glimmenden roten Gewands ertönt ein Triller – Binhärisch, die heilige Sprache des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Die binhäre Hymne verwandelt sich in eine {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthetisierte Stimme, die wie Donner über einer riesigen Ebene klingt:{/n} "Keinen Schritt weiter."
languages.original_text: {n}A trill comes from the folds of the partially smouldering crimson raiment — it is binharic speech, the sacred language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The binharic hymn transforms into a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesised voice that sounds like thunder rolling over a vast plain:{/n} "Not another step."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus den Falten des teilweise noch glimmenden roten Gewands ertönt ein Triller – Binhärisch, die heilige Sprache des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Die binhärische Hymne verwandelt sich in eine gleichförmige Stimme, die das {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voxsystem{/g} künstlich erzeugt:{/n} "Identifiziert Euch und nennt Eure Absichten."

languages.original_text: {n}A trill comes from the folds of the partially smouldering crimson raiment — it is binharic speech, the sacred language of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The binharic hymn transforms into a vox-synthesised voice that sounds like thunder rolling over a vast plain:{/n} "Not another step."

languages.text: {n}Kısmen dumanı tüten kat kat kızıl giysisinin kıvrımlarından titrek bir ses geliyor. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus'un{/g} kutsal lisanı ikilidil bu. İkilidil ilahi, engin bir ovada gürleyen bir gök gürültüsüne benzer, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} sentezli bir sese evriliyor.{/n} "Bir adım daha atma."
languages.original_text: {n}A trill comes from the folds of the partially smouldering crimson raiment — it is binharic speech, the sacred language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. The binharic hymn transforms into a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesised voice that sounds like thunder rolling over a vast plain:{/n} "Not another step."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kısmen dumanı tüten kat kat kızıl giysisinin kıvrımlarından titrek bir ses geliyor. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}'un kutsal lisanı ikilidil bu. İkilidil ilahi, engin bir ovada gürleyen bir gök gürültüsüne benzer, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} sentezli bir sese evriliyor:{/n} "Bir adım daha atma."
